annotations.label: corner

annotations.label: y-card

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Daley Blind (Manchester United) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Manchester United). Manchester United get a corner.
Andy King (Leicester) takes a wonderful touch after collecting a pass inside the box. He steers his shot goalwards, but the keeper produces a decent save!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) sends in a poor cross from the corner and Ron Robert Zieler has no trouble gathering it.

Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Manchester United) latches on to a precise defence splitting pass and fires a nice strike from a promising distance towards the bottom right corner. Ron Robert Zieler has a clear sight of it and makes a comfortable save. The ball goes out of play. Manchester United are awarded a corner kick.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) unleashed a promising volley from the edge of the box, but he narrowly misses the target as his shot goes over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Demarai Gray (Leicester) scores a splendid goal as he finishes his great individual effort with a venomous shot from around 21 metres out into the top right corner. Take a bow son. The score is now 4:1.
Neat passing move from Manchester United in order to create new attacking opportunities.

Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Manchester United) leaps high to meet a lofted pass inside the six yard box, but his header flies yards wide of the right post.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Today's referee Michael Dean rightly decides to book Robert Huth (Leicester) for his harsh tackle.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Manchester United) attempted to pick out a free teammate inside the box, but Ron Robert Zieler comes off the line to clear the ball away.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

There was plenty of entertainment during the first 45 minutes. Hopefully more of the same in the second half. Manchester United enjoyed superiority over the opposition in that first 45 minutes. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.
